Recommendations: 1. In-service training for personnel be conducted to provide re-orientation on the implementation of correct communication channel.
2. Budgeting must be participatory so that the college is involved in the budget preparations especially in allocating funds for research activities for faculty and personnel.
3. The Dean, faculty and administration should work together to strengthen their linkages.
4. There should be a monitoring system in the implementation of the Development Plan.
5. There should be a regular updating of the Development Plan.
6. The functions of the head of offices should be clearly stated and well defined.
